name: The Bigger Picture (Max Winzar)
description:
Made over 48 hours during the AIE Adelaide Game Jam 2019 (Magnification).

You play as a detective, your next case is to investigate the untimely demise of Mr Barrows. You must piece together information and perhaps discover the bigger picture.

Use the glasses to magnify objects, this will help you in your investigation.

Controls:

Use WASD keys to move around
Left click to pick up objects and open doors
Hold right click to rotate objects
Press E to pick up glasses
Use either 1,2,3 or 4 keys to switch between pairs of glasses

Lead Designer - Max Winzar

Designer - Zain Collins

Lead Programmer - Kaleb Ryan

Programmer - Caleb Appleby

Programmer - Blake Morrison
